p: Fourier transform infrared (FTIR) spectra of leaf oil microencapsulated with β-cyclodextrin were obtained using a FTS-40 spectrometer (Bio-Rad, Hercules, CA, USA) incorporating a Spectra Tech diffuse reflectance accessory unit. The spectral resolution is 4 cm −1, and the scanning range is 4000 to 400 cm −1 [ 24, 32].
